name: SimiliScan
description: SimiliScan is the first Pattern Recognition Engine for DeFi. Its purpose is to provide traders, developers, and communities with tools to identify repeating behaviors across contracts, wallets, and social networks. The platform allows users to detect cloned contracts, trace wallet overlaps, and analyze shared social audiences in seconds. By making hidden patterns visible, SimiliScan reduces risk, prevents exposure to scams, and creates a data-driven foundation for smarter trading decisions.
